Header: 18 hour water cut in several areas in Colombo
Content: The National Water Supply and Drainage Board has announced that the supply of water to several areas in Colombo will be suspended tomorrow to undertake urgent maintenance. The supply of water to several areas in Kotahena, Grandpass, Modera and Mattakkuliya is due to be suspended for a period of eighteen hours from 9.00 am tomorrow. In addition, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board said that water will be supplied to Colombo Fort and Pettah areas under low pressure.
